data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Daudt, Luiz C. C., Amato, José F. R. (2007): Morphological variation of Stratiodrilus circensis (Polychaeta, Histriobdellidae) from a new host, Aegla leptodactyla (Crustacea, Anomura, Aeglidae) with identification of its type host species *. Zootaxa 1450: 57-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176233
